author: alon.ssv.network
content:
I'm still not convinced we have a good enough standard to reduce slashing risk.

A user, by accident, uses his seed on tesnet and mainnet will get himself slashed with 100% probability (signing at slot X on testnet and then on slot X on mainnet).

I think because of how sensitive it is we might need to consider having different derivation paths.
